name: ZANSKAR GEOTHERMAL & MINERALS, INC.
description: Zanskar uses AI to find and de-risk hidden geothermal resources.
sampleDescriptions: Discuss issues related to geothermal exploration and leasing.
Discuss issues related to geothermal exploration and leasing. Discuss geothermal energy tax credits in H.R. 1, the One Big Beautiful Bill Act.
Discuss issues related to geothermal exploration and leasing. Discuss geothermal energy tax credits in P.L. 119-21, the One Big Beautiful Bill Act.
Discuss issues related to geothermal exploration and leasing. Discuss permitting reform, including H.R. 4776, the SPEED Act.
